name: portofolio-site
description: Portfolio site using Vite, TailwindCSS, and Node.js with TypeScript server.

scripts.backend: npm install --prefix server && npm run build -- prefix server
scripts.frontend: npm install --prefix client && npm run build -- prefix client
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run frontendDev" "npm run tailwind" "npm run backendDev"
scripts.build: npm run backend && npm run tailwind && npm run frontend
